verses.roman:
āveśe calilā prabhu jagannātha-mandire
jagannātha dekhi' preme ha-ilā asthire

synonyms: āveśe—in ecstasy; calilā—went; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; jagannātha-mandire—to the temple of Jagannātha; jagannātha dekhi'-seeing the Jagannātha Deity; preme—in ecstasy; ha-ilā—became; asthire—restless.
translation: In ecstasy, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went from Āṭhāranālā to the temple of Jagannātha. After seeing Lord Jagannātha, He became very restless due to love of Godhead.
